name: RHINESTONE STUD CROSS HANDBAG
RHINESTONE CROSS HANDBAG
TRIPLE CROSS WESTERN PURSE
WESTERN DOUBLE PISTOL RHINESTONE PURSE
Infared Sauna Blanket
description:
Burn up to 600 calories in less than an hour.


• Effective warming from the Inside Out! 
• Heat lasts and deepens through the whole session 
• Therapy for areas of the body that are too cool 
• Goes where circulation is poor, fat accumulates 
• Heat reaches deep into the body tissues where it can be effective 

Also for arthritis, joints pain, stiff muscles, injuries to tendons and ligaments to promote a faster self body healing effect.

Individual Session is $50.00

name: Fruit Smoothie Body Wrap
description:
Try our delicious mix of berries for a truly unique treatment, full of fruit acids and essential vitamins that work overtime to reveal smooth, supple skin. Enriched with coconut milk, red raspberry oil and real strawberries, getting your daily vitamins has never before been so indulgent. Our Fruit Smoothie Body Wrap includes scrub and wrap followed by a relaxing massage. 



In house price completed by certified wrap tech: $140.00
Contact us at: 1-866-324-8470 for your appointment!

name: Citrus Twist Makeup Remover
description:
Citrus Twist Makeup Remover

This cleanser goes to work on tough eye makeup, rendering it powerless with our olive-derived cleanser and a soothing blend of five nourishing botanical extracts. With its invigorating burst of natural citrus oils, getting clean never smelled so good.

name: Cooling Cucumber Facial Toner
description:
Cooling Cucumber Facial Toner

Gently balance and soothe your skin with Bella Luccé's alcohol-free Cucumber Toner. Pure ingredients restore natural pH, tighten pores and remove residue for a bright, fresh complexion. This nourishing blend of aloe, cucumber distillate, witch hazel and rose hydrosol is gentle enough for sensitive skin and offers an amazing, natural cucumber aroma.

name: Detoxifying Ginger-Wasabi Masque
description:
Detoxifying Ginger-Wasabi Masque

Designed to deeply detoxify delicate facial tissue as it enriches the skin with potent antioxidants and gentle skin conditioners, this innovative powdered masque was inspired by ancient Asian beauty secrets. Crushed freshwater pearls brighten skin as activated charcoal deep-cleans pores and pure ginger stimulates circulation. A powerful purifying mask that will cleanse and brighten your skin.

name: Face-Firming Serum
description:
Face-Firming Serum

A cocktail of skin-loving nutrients, Bella Luccé's Face-Firming Serum is quickly becoming one of our most requested products. Formulated with a cocktail of proven skin boosters: natural Alpha Hydroxy Acids, DMEA, Beta Carotene, Cranberry, Red Raspberry and Meadowfoam Seed oils, and vitamins A, C and E, this amazing serum visibly tightens and refines delicate eye tissue while pumping it full of vitamins and nutrients. Designed especially for the eyes, our clients are raving about this synergistic blend's ability to tighten the neck and mouth areas as well. Light enough to wear under your makeup; it doubles as an incredible daily facial lotion.

name: Guavaberry Revitalizing Masque
description:
Guavaberry Revitalizing Masque

This innovative powdered masque is formulated with beauty secrets cultivated in the Amazonian Rainforest. Delicate facial tissue is enriched with a cocktail of potent antioxidants and gentle skin conditioners as natural fruit acids dissolve the invisible web that allows expired cells to cling to the surface of the skin. The result is a radiant, renewed complexion that is better suited to battling everyday toxins and environmental stresses.

name: Multifruit Regenerative Face Crème
description:
Multifruit Regenerative Face Crème

Our decadent crème deeply nourishes with olive squalane, sunflower oil and silk proteins as it fortifies the skin to fight the signs of aging. This proprietary blend of fruit extracts, which function as natural alpha hydroxy acids (AHA’s), is clinically proven to gently remove dull, dead cells and replace them with healthy skin, boosting new cell growth by more than 20%. We blend in generous doses of vitamin E and green tea extract to combat environmental toxins that oxidize the skin and accelerate aging. Spiked with an energizing blend of natural essential oils, the creme smells as divine as it feels.

name: Peruvian Chocolate Renewing Masque
description:
Peruvian Chocolate Renewing Masque

What better way to renew your skin and release your worries than to paint yourself in chocolate? The lactic acid and vitamins in coconut milk combine with pure cocoa powder to create a 100% natural masque for the face, feet and everything in between. Mix it up, paint it on and watch your worries melt! Beautifully gift boxed and accompanied by a spa-quality body brush and a handful of delicious Belgian chocolates embossed with the Bella Luccè signature. Proudly created with Dagoba organic chocolate.

name: Pink Grapefruit Foaming Cleanser
description:
Pink Grapefruit Foaming Cleanser

Mild, natural cleansers erase dirt and grime with their luxurious foam as vitamin e, passion fruit, fig and aloe extracts work overtime to clarify and refine the skin. Enjoy a smooth, supple, radiantly beautiful glow without that tight, itchy feeling.

name: Pomegranate Polishing Crème
description:
Pomegranate Polishing Crème

Pomegranate extract, naturally rich in age-reversing ellagic acid, is the cornerstone of this unique exfoliating crème. Tiny microderm abrasion crystals (the same variety used in spas around the country for those ultra-expensive facial treatments) are sprinkled throughout the nourishing crème to slough dead cells which dull the surface of the skin. With just a few applications per week, skin will be smoother, softer and visibly radiant.

name: Sea Kelp & Green Tea Masque
description:
Sea Kelp & Green Tea Masque

This innovative dry mask combines Moroccan Rhassoul Clay with a nourishing botanical blend that includes sea kelp and green tea extract. Brimming with natural antioxidants and potent polyphenols, this remarkable treatment removes toxins and impurities and refines skin texture as it tones and replenishes minerals essential to healthy skin. Mix with water, yogurt, milk or puréed fruit according to skin type to create a completely natural facial masque that'll have your skin glowing.

name: Sesame-Rice Facial Cleansing Oil
description:
Sesame-Rice Facial Cleansing Oil

This gentle, detergent-free facial cleanser is the perfect solution for those plagued by particularly sensitive or extra-dry complexions. Golden sesame and rice oils make quick work of daily grime and delicately dissolve even the most stubborn eye makeup, without the harsh surfactants present in typical cleansers. The result is a natural, oil-based cleanser that whisks away dirt without clogging pores.

name: Shiitake-Green Tea Antioxidant Serum
description:
Shiitake-Green Tea Antioxidant Serum

Our Shiitake & Green Tea Antioxidant Serum will saturate the skin with a cocktail of potent antioxidants that act as your mainline defense against everyday toxins and environmental damage. The serum temporarily tightens and lifts facial tissue for a fresh, radiant look. Formulated with shiitake and reishi mushrooms, green, white and roobios teas, olive squalane and real crushed freshwater pearls.

name: Strawberries & Cream Masque
description:
Strawberries & Cream Masque

Luscious strawberries blend with Argiletz rose clay and powdered buttermilk to create an amazing facial treatment that softens and renews tired skin as it boosts brightness. The naturally-occurring vitamins in milk strengthen the tissues as fruit acids encourage cell renewal for a healthier complexion. Blend with water, yogurt, milk or puréed fruit according to skin type to create a fresh, 100% natural treat for the face.

name: Warming Pumpkin Masque
description:
Warming Pumpkin Masque

Pumpkin is one of the most powerful weapons in Mother Nature's aresenal and nowhere is that more evident than in this soothing face masque. The natural enzymes in organic pumpkin dissolve dead cells as our gentle blend of powdered honey and detoxifying clay draws toxins from the skin. Coconut milk deeply nourishes tired tissue as you enjoy a burst of warmth when the masque is mixed and applied. You’ll notice softer, visibly renewed skin after just one application.

name: Bali Kopi Coffee Scrub
description:
Bali Kopi Coffee Scrub

Inspired by an authentic Balinese spa treatment, Bella Luccè's new Bali Kopi Coffee Scrub will invigorate your senses as it smoothes the skin. Enjoy a powerful blast of caffeine, a potent free radical scavenger and cell detoxifier, with this aromatic blend of organic Ethiopian and Indonesian beans and rich coffee absolute. Isn't it time you gave your body a wake-up call?

name: Bamboo & Black Sesame Body Rub
description:
Bamboo & Black Sesame Body Rub

Breathe new life into your skin with an array of ancient Asian secrets. Crushed adzuki beans, powdered bamboo and real shiitake mushrooms mingle with black sesame seeds and organic oils in this creamy scrub, designed to shed expired cells and reveal a more radiant complexion.

name: Chianti & Grape Seed Crush
description:
Chianti & Grape Seed Crush

Bathing in red wine may well be the only thing more blissful than drinking it, and true wine connoisseurs will rejoice in the opportunity with our Chianti & Grape Seed Crush. Mediterranean olive oil, crushed grape seeds, blackberry fibers and luscious red wine mingle in this innovative brew, designed to gently polish skin to a rosy glow. Or shall we say “Rosé”?

name: Cranberry-Yuzu Sugar Scrub
description:
Cranberry-Yuzu Sugar Scrub

Tired of those messy mixes of oils and irritating salts? Take heart- Bella Luccé's innovative formula exfoliates dead skin cells before emulsifying itself into a lotion, allowing the sugar scrub to rinse cleanly and moisturize the skin without any greasy residue. Our luxurious blend combines pure cane sugar, cranberry seeds, organic shea butter, sunflower and coconut oils with an intoxicating citrus fragrance that leaves oily scrubs and their hard-to-open jars in the dust.

name: Green Tea & Crushed Rice Body Scrub
description:
Green Tea & Crushed Rice Body Scrub

Green Tea, long revered for its antioxidant properties, is the cornerstone of this amazingly fresh body scrub. Crushed rice, green tea extract, green tea leaves and bamboo powder combine in a Thai-inspired treat that sloughs dead skin cells to reveal fresher, healthier looking skin. Our unique line of creamy scrubs emulsify when they come in contact with water, so they rinse clean and leave you feeling remarkably soft without oily residue.

name: Norwegian Oceanic Salt Rub
description:
Norwegian Oceanic Salt Rub

Pamper your skin with the goodness of the sea. This creamy scrub is fortified with exotic oils and butters, Pacific sea salts, and real Nori Seaweed for a one-of-a-kind skin conditioning treat. Shed those cells which dull the skin and leave your skin glowing from head to toe. You’ll look as though you just got back from that tropical beach vacation, minus the dreadful jet lag.

name: Passionfruit Guava Body Rub
description:
Passionfruit Guava Body Rub

Forever banish dull, dry skin with this decadently creamy body scrub from Bella Luccè. Macadamia nut, babassu and passionfruit oils mingle with a cocktail of Amazonian fruits and organic cupuacu butter to shed dead skin and lock in vital moisture. The result is visibly radiant, silky smooth skin.

name: Peruvian Chocolate Sugar Scrub
description:
Peruvian Chocolate Sugar Scrub

Prime-pressed cocoa butter and coconut oil nourish as pure cane sugar sloughs dead cells to reveal softer, more radiant skin. This decadent chocolate body scrub is created with organic Dagoba chocolate, French cocoa absolute and premium, golden cocoa butter for a 100% natural indulgence. Believe in the power of chocolate…

name: Pumpkin Glow Body Scrub
description:
Pumpkin Glow Body Scrub

The enzymes in pumpkin pulp combine with pumpkin seed oil to dissolve dull, dead cells, revealing the healthy radiant skin underneath. Pure cane sugar is enveloped in this creamy blend of nourishing oils and butters, spiked with warm, aromatic essential oils for a soothing treat. As with all Bella Luccè scrubs, our Pumpkin Glow emulsifies into a creamy lotion when applied, then rinses clean for delectably soft skin without oily residue.

name: South Seas Body Buff
description:
South Seas Body Buff

Reinvent your skin with the ancient secrets of Southeast Asian spas. Crushed coconut husks, organic lemongrass and pure cane sugar mingle with authentic Monoi de Tahiti oil, a delicate French Polynesian fusion of tropical flowers macerated in fresh coconut oil. One massage with this tropical treat and you’ll soon be celebrating radiant, lusciously supple skin. The natural aroma of tropical gardenias mingles amongst an abundance of indigenous ingredients in this 100% natural sugar scrub. Bella Luccè's Monoi de Tahiti oil bears the official Appellation D'Origine of the French Polynesian government.

name: Wildberry Body Polish
description:
Wildberry Body Polish

Succulent strawberries, plucked from the garden when perfectly ripe, blend with red raspberry oil and pure cane sugar in a delicious sugar scrub that fortifies the skin with fruit acids and essential vitamins. Never an oily residue, this creamy paste leaves only a delightful berry aroma in its wake. Buff away dead cells to unveil smooth, supple skin.

name: Acai Antioxidant Body Creme
description:
Acai Antioxidant Body Creme

Restore supple skin with this incredibly rich- yet impossibly light- body crème from Bella Luccè. Formulated with an array of indigenous Amazonian ingredients, it enriches the skin with a cocktail of potent antioxidants as nourishing oils lock in moisture and feed the skin a steady supply of critical nutrients. Formulated with acai, macadamia nut and passionfruit oils and certified organic cupuacu butter, it’s all you need for silky soft, beautifully smooth skin.

name: Bacchus Body Oil
description:
Bacchus Body Oil

Bacchus was the oft-celebrated Roman god of wine. Annual festivals held in his honor were such wild affairs that they were eventually banned by the Roman government. We invite you to create a little debauchery of your own with our luscious wine-inspired body oil. This impossibly light blend of Mediterranean olive oil and red grape seed extract locks in moisture as it pumps the skin full of natural vitamins and antioxidants. It doubles as massage oil that won’t stain your linens…even Bacchus would be proud.

name: Orchid & Crushed Pearl Body Creme
description:
Orchid & Crushed Pearl Body Creme

A beauty regimen worthy of the rich and famous, this moisturizer can only be described as a positively decadent way to replenish deep hydration all over your body. Formulated with nourishing oils and crushed freshwater pearls, our luscious moisturizer harnesses the power of real orchids. It’s all you need for silky soft, beautifully smooth skin.

name: Tahitian Body Glaze
description:
Tahitian Body Glaze

Pure Monoi de Tahiti oil caresses every inch of your skin, kissing it with the alluring aroma of tropical flowers. Completely natural and amazingly pure, this decadent body oil deeply hydrates skin, locking in moisture and encouraging a fresh, youthful-looking appearance. Presented in a beautiful corked glass bottle, our Monoi de Tahiti oil bears the official Appellation D'Origine of the French Polynesian government.

name: Cooling Peppermint Foot Crème
description:
Cooling Peppermint Foot Crème

Rich in aloe butter and nourishing fruit extracts, this remarkable formula contains mint essential oil, designed to permeate the skin to deliver a brisk cooling sensation. Smooth and restore neglected feet to reveal sandal-worthy toes!What is it?
An intensely hydrating foot cream that feeds the skin a steady supply of rich nutrients in order to restore suppleness and tame wayward toes.

name: Silk & Honey Lotion
description:
Silk & Honey Lotion

Our rich, creamy lotion is full of skin-loving indulgences: real honey, pure silk, exotic butters, nourishing organic oils and a select blend of fruit extracts. This exclusive formula absorbs quickly, yet the softness lasts for hours. 


Fragrance Descriptions:


French Sugared Vanilla: This creamy, sophisticated vanilla blend is reminiscent of a charming French café.

Japanese Yuzu: An indigenous grapefruit native to Asia, the yuzu fruit is bursting with a sparkling citrus aroma and a twist of mandarin for a truly invigorating blend. Say it: you-zoo.

Thai Coconut Lemongrass: An exotic touch of tropical Thailand...creamy coconut and fresh, crisp lemongrass.

Arctic Fresh: A true spa fragrance featuring a fresh, clean aroma kissed by a touch of mint. 

Wildberry: A bright medley of sweet, juicy berries with luscious fruit notes

name: Moisturizing Body Wash
description:
Moisturizing Body Wash

Indulge in the creamy lather of our mild, sulfate-free body wash enriched with exotic fruit extracts and pure mango butter to discover how smooth, supple and radiantly beautiful your skin can be. One try and you’ll forever banish harsh detergents and artificial cleansers from your bath and shower. Lather it up, massage it on and get clean! 


Fragrance Descriptions:


French Sugared Vanilla: This creamy, sophisticated vanilla blend is reminiscent of a charming French café.

Japanese Yuzu: An indigenous grapefruit native to Asia, the yuzu fruit is bursting with a sparkling citrus aroma and a twist of mandarin for a truly invigorating blend. Say it: you-zoo.

Thai Coconut Lemongrass: An exotic touch of tropical Thailand...creamy coconut and fresh, crisp lemongrass.

Arctic Fresh: A true spa fragrance featuring a fresh, clean aroma kissed by a touch of mint. Fragrance Descriptions

Wildberry: A bright medley of sweet, juicy berries with luscious fruit notes

name: Coconut Mango Bath Bliss
description:
Coconut Mango Bath Bliss

Escape your worries and forget those "to-do" lists as you turn your everyday bathing ritual into a spa-worthy experience with Bella Luccè’s Bath Bliss. Epsom salts relieve muscle tension and coconut milk soothes the skin as real mango bits (rich in vitamin A, C and Beta Carotene) steep in the bath water. And the very best part? No mess in the basin to clean up afterwards. After all…what fun is a decadent bath if you’re left scrubbing up when it’s finished?

name: Goji Berry Bath Bliss
description:
Goji Berry Bath Bliss

A delightful hybrid between a bath tea and a milk bath, Goji Berry Bath Bliss delivers the best of both worlds: all of the luxury with none of the mess. We invite you to turn your daily bathing ritual into a spa-worthy experience with Bella Luccè’s Bath Bliss. Epsom salts relieve tension and coconut milk soothes the skin as organic goji berries (rich in vitamins B, C and potent antioxidants) steep in the bath water. And the very best part? No mess in the basin to clean up afterwards. After all…what fun is a decadent bath if you’re left scrubbing up when it’s finished?

name: Mandi Lulur Petal Bath
description:
Mandi Lulur Petal Bath

Japanese princesses have celebrated the pleasures of fresh flower baths for centuries. Believed to be a tangible link to the spiritual world, floral baths mark important occasions and rite of passage rituals in many Southeast Asian cultures. You, too, can play amongst the rich colors and soft textures of stunning marmalade roses, majestic purple peonies and dainty calendula petals as soothing Epsom salts release muscle tension and coconut milk feeds the skin.

name: Peruvian Chocolate Body Wash
description:
Peruvian Chocolate Body Wash

Detergents are fine for dishes and cars, but doesn’t your skin deserve a bit better? We certainly think so…and that’s why Bella Luccè has formulated this deliciously creamy sulfate-free body wash. Created with ultra-mild cleansers and enriched with nourishing shea butter, an abundance of exotic botanical extracts and pure French cocoa absolute, this gentle body wash whisks away everyday dirt and grime to leave your skin feeling amazingly soft with the lingering aroma of decadently rich chocolate.

name: Starfruit Banana Butter Cream Bath
description: Starfruit Banana Butter Cream BathA luxuriously frothy topping for your next bath, Bella Luccè’s Starfruit Banana Butter Crème Bath infuses the water with silky moisturizers, organic shea butter, real fruit and the delicious aroma of Amazonian sugar apples. This divine little jar elicits more compliments than any other in the collection…one try and you’ll know why.

name: Chocolate Silk Bath Bubbles
description:
Chocolate Silk Bath Bubbles

Ever dreamt of bathing in a vat of chocolate? Our Chocolate Silk Bath Bubbles offer all the bliss and none of the mess. Use the elegant bamboo spoon to dissolve a scoop of our bubble bath into warm water to unleash a sinfully delicious chocolate aroma as pure cocoa, lush oils and silk proteins envelope your skin. Say goodbye to bubble baths that dry the skin and enjoy our creamy bubble bath bursting with moisturizers.

name: Peruvian Chocolate Moisturizing Syrup
description:
Peruvian Chocolate Moisturizing Syrup

Discover a luscious chocolate paradise as you relax in an oasis of skin-softening oils. This amazing moisturizer harnesses the power of chocolate with French cocoa absolute and chocolate extract, enriched with a dash of organic honey.

name: Manuka Honey Drizzle
description:
Manuka Honey Drizzle

Manuka, a rare variety of honey harvested only in New Zealand, is universally celebreated for its restorative and antibacterial properties. This divine honey forms the foundation of a nourishing bath treatment, further enriched with a unique blend of citrus extracts and pure essential oils. Manuka Honey Drizzle may well be the most innovative bath you'll never want to live without.

name: Fruit and Creme Bath
description:
Fruit and Creme Bath

Indulge in one of our luxurious Fruit & Crème Baths and turn your every day bathing ritual into a spa-worthy experience. Studded with bits of real fruit and enriched with mango butter chips and powdered silk, each sachet will richly fragrance the bath as they fortify the water with skin-softening luxuries and the natural antioxidants present in fruit. When you’re all through soaking, just toss the bag and start anew- no fuss, no muss, just divinely fresh bathing.

Each gift box contains three scented bath sachets: choose Mandarin, Peach,
Raspberry or our Sampler Box (containing one sachet in each fragrance).

options.name: Sampler Box (containing one sachet in each fragrance)

name: Cooling Peppermint Foot Polish
description:
Cooling Peppermint Foot Polish

Powdered pumice, a natural volcanic rock, gently sloughs dead cells as organic jojoba and soybean oils nourish dry, cracked skin. Keep your feet looking their fresh-from-the-spa best as you enjoy the brisk cooling sensation of peppermint essential oil.

name: Cooling Peppermint Foot Soak
description:
Cooling Peppermint Foot Soak

Dissolve a scoop of our energizing foot soak into warm water for a refreshing indulgence after a long day on your feet. Peppermint essential oil delivers a brisk cooling sensation that relaxes tired feet as moisturizing oils soften the skin and Hawaiian Alaea Sea Salt works to reduce swelling and increase circulation.

name: Peppermint Nitetime Foot Repair
description:
Peppermint Nitetime Foot Repair

When your feet need more than a dab of crème, Nitetime Foot Repair is your saving grace. Our unique blend of aloe vera, olive oil, and vegetable glycerin penetrates deeply to help soften and renew dry, chapped feet while fruit extracts infuse the skin with alpha hydroxy acids that gently peel away layers of dead skin to encourage cell turnover.

name: Peruvian Chocolate Bliss Crème
description:
Peruvian Chocolate Bliss Crème

Rich in prime-pressed cocoa butter and natural emollients, Bliss Crème moisturizes from head-to-toe, all while indulging your not-so-secret chocolate fantasy. Free from artificial fragrance and color, yet full of natural nourishment for dry skin, this delicious chocolate crème will quench your skin's thirst and leave you smelling divine.

name: Tropical Hawaiian Fruit Peel
description:
Tropical Hawaiian Fruit Peel

Escape to the islands as you saturate your skin with natural vitamins and enzymes harvested from tropical coconuts, mangoes, papayas and pineapples. Purifying clays gently draw toxins from deep within the tissue while luscious fruit enzymes chemically dissolve the web of expired cells that cling to the surface of your skin- revealing a healthy, radiant complexion. Delightfully fresh and deliciously natural, this spa-at-home treatment is your one-way ticket to youthful looking skin.

name: Mediterranean Wine & Honey Masque
description:
Mediterranean Wine & Honey Masque

Escape to the rolling hills of the Mediterranean as you paint yourself from head-to-toe in this delectable body masque. This luxe spa treatment boasts an arsenal of potent age-fighters, including polyphenols, resveratrol and natural vitamins. Fortify your skin’s natural defenses as gentle clays draw toxins from deep within your tissue and golden olive oil locks in moisture. Remember all those classic Italian beauties? Now you know their secret: copious amounts of rich red wine, lashings of pure honey and a dash of over-the-top pampering. And that’s certainly a beauty secret worth discovering…

name: Hibiscus & Honeysuckle Hair Treatment
description:
Hibiscus & Honeysuckle Hair Treatment

Bella Luccè’s Hibiscus & Honeysuckle Treatment is a supercharged weekly restorative treatment that delivers a potent cocktail of essential nutrients for hair and scalp. Pro-Vitamin B5 increases the strength of the hair shaft and prevents damage caused by overheating as it tames split ends. Wheat protein works overtime to boost body while organic hibiscus extract restores silkiness to all hair types. Finally, a blend of organic shea butter, real honey and macadamia nut oil feed the hair and lock in moisture…sexy, shiny, beautifully soft hair is within your reach.

name: Ancient Red Sea Salt Soak
description:
Ancient Red Sea Salt Soak

Bella Luccè invites you to jet off to the famed Egyptian Red Sea to cavort in the famed healing waters of the region…no passport required. Epsom and Dead Sea salts transform your bath into a luxurious cocktail of essential minerals as Moroccan lava clay cleanses and coconut milk swirls around you, softening and conditioning the skin while fig extract and sweet almond oil dance in the water. You’ll emerge from your bathing oasis refreshed, relaxed and silky smooth.

name: Desert Oasis Body & Linen Mist
description:
Desert Oasis Body & Linen Mist

Scientists have determined that the sense of smell is the most powerful of all five senses…one whiff of Bella Luccè’s Desert Oasis Body & Linen Mist and we’re certain you’ll agree. Sensuous sandalwood mingles with pure vanilla in this non-staining mist that adds a sophisticated touch to bed linens, bath robes and cotton towels. But your linens shouldn’t have all the fun. This aloe-infused, pH balanced formula will kiss bare skin with a light veil of moisture and leave you smelling fabulous.

name: Exotic Date & Wild Honey Buff
description:
Exotic Date & Wild Honey Buff

At Bella Luccè, we can’t imagine anything more supremely simple or decidedly decadent than sweet dates drizzled with golden honey. This traditional Arabian delicacy is the inspiration for our luxuriously creamy scrub, created by combining some of the region’s natural treasures: Turkish coffee and real vanilla beans are enveloped in sweet almond and pomegranate oils infused with pure honey, real dates, red sandalwood and Moroccan lava clay. It’s a sensual journey through exotic Arabia, and you don’t even need to leave the shower.

name: Moroccan Incense Massage Oil
description:
Moroccan Incense Massage Oil

Morocco is famous for its legendary spice markets, or “souks” as they are known locally. Taking our cue from the colorful bags of powdered essences, Bella Luccè has infused this nourishing massage oil with the earthy, sensuous aromas of sandalwood and vanilla. Golden olive and sweet almond oils glide across the skin, as fig extract works its magic as a celebrated aphrodisiac.

name: Moroccan Lava Cleansing Bar
description:
Moroccan Lava Cleansing Bar

Sometimes it’s the small things in life that bring us the greatest joy... your mother’s best home-cooked meal, freshly laundered linens, a richly lathering bar of soap in the shower with an intoxicating aroma that dances on the skin all day. We may not be able to cook like your mother, but we know a thing or two about luxury soap at Bella Luccè. Handmade in small batches like a fine microbrew, this creamy bar blends natural oils and pure shea butter with Moroccan lava clay and Turkish coffee. Guaranteed to put a pep in your step as it gently cleans and lightly exfoliates. Send mom our condolences.

name: Nourishing Sandalwood & Almond Crème
description:
Nourishing Sandalwood & Almond Crème

If scientists could bottle heaven, you’d be holding it right now. Luxuriously creamy yet impossibly light, this nourishing body crème blends natural sweet almond, pomegranate and olive oils with pure fig extract and rich kokum better. Enriched with the sensual, exotic aromas of sandalwood and vanilla, it’s as close to heaven as many of us will ever come. Amen.

name: Sandalwood Infused Dead Sea Mud
description:
Sandalwood Infused Dead Sea Mud

Sometimes you have to get dirty to get clean….quite often, that’s half the fun. If the word “mud” stirs memories of childhood naughtiness, Bella Luccè invites you to look at mud in a whole new light. Harvested from the banks of the Dead Sea, this pure, sterilized mud is rich in natural minerals that gently cleanse delicate skin tissue as they whisk impurities from deep within pores. The result is a brighter, smoother complexion with a natural moisture balance. This is decidedly sophisticated mud, several thousand years in the making, gathered from the world’s most mysterious and celebrated waters. Silky smooth and enriched with the warm aroma of real sandalwood for a 100% natural indulgence. Go ahead…get dirty.

name: Spiced Pomegranate & Yogurt Detox
description:
Spiced Pomegranate & Yogurt Detox

Desperate times call for drastic measures…Bella Luccè to the rescue. Treat fatigued skin to a restorative retreat worthy of the world’s finest spas. Rich yogurt, real buttermilk and golden honey soften and condition the skin as Moroccan lava clay deep cleans pores and draws out impurities. Pomegranates deliver a powerful antioxidant punch to this completely natural face and body masque designed to cleanse, refresh and renew in record time. To Enjoy: Once per week, blend ¼ cup of masque with 2 tablespoon of water to create a fresh, 100% natural masque. Apply to clean skin and remove with warm water after 10 minutes. To boost the power of the masque, choose a targeted mixer, designed for your specific skin type, and use in place of water when mixing.

Skin Type	Suggested Mixer
Combination	Yogurt
Mature	Carrot juice
Oily	Milk
Dry	Heavy cream

name: Balinese Body Polish
description:
Balinese Body Polish

Our newest body offering, inspired by an authentic Balinese spa experience, marries our energizing Bali Kopi Coffee Scrub with a moisturizer in our rich vanilla fragrance to create an irresistible new way to enjoy your coffee and cream. Blending coffee absolute with pure cane sugar and organic, fair-trade coffee, this treatment both detoxifies and exfoliates as it gives the body a java infused wake-up call. Our Balinese Body Polish includes an exfoliation treatment followed by a massage.

In house price completed by certified wrap tech: $90.00
Contact us at: 1-866-324-8470 for your appointment!

name: Chocolate Covered Strawberry Wrap
description:
Chocolate Covered Strawberry Wrap

We’ve pulled out all the stops, marrying together deliciously fresh strawberries with our insanely decadent chocolate collection to create a treatment with a nod to all things romantic. Enriched with real strawberries, pure shea butter and organic cocoa, clients will enjoy this one-of-a-kind treat.

In house price completed by certified wrap tech: $140.00
Contact us at: 1-866-324-8470 for your appointment!

name: Detoxifying Thai Body Wrap
description:
Detoxifying Thai Body Wrap

All things Asian are hot this season and we’ve designed these unique products by looking to the Orient for inspiration. Our fusion of rice bran oil, green tea leaves and extract, creamy coconut and crisp lemongrass forms the basis of this long-to-be-remembered treatment.
